channel.title: Need help with a new SCAR Script im making! please!
channel.description:
Ok, so im making a SCAR script for a game, i made the script loop using the:
[code=python]begin repeat LoadBitmap; Interupt; until(false)
end.[/code]
function.
But then, after a few minutes or so of looping, the program just suddenly stops, and displays this error message:
[code=python][Runtime Error] : Exception: Can't create compatible DC in line 88 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.15\Scripts\Interupter.scar[/code]
line 88 is the begining of a bitmapstring function
[code=python]DistractingShot := BitmapFromString(30, 23, 'beNpFlFlU01kSx' +[/code]
that is line 88, can anyone tell me what is wrong / why i would be getting this error message??

item.title: Need help with a new SCAR Script im making! please!
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

LoadBitmap is already a function.
Itâ€™s used for loading bitmaps from an image.

Just change the name of your procedure and reference and your good to go

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a new SCAR Script im making! please!

item.title: Need help with a new SCAR Script im making! please!
item.dc:creator: @xrunehunterx xrunehunterx
item.description:

no im not, if you want to see ill show you my entire script.

       'P1/sJAY8oZ6MTPG7/FxKCz/E=');
end;

procedure Interupt;
var
 a, b, c, d, x, y :integer;
 
begin
IF (FindBitmapToleranceIn(SkillActivate, x, y, 600, 100, 1130, 120, 30)) Then
a:=1;
IF (a=1) Then
IF(IsMouseButtonDown(false)) Then
IF (FindBitmapToleranceIn(MagebaneShot, x, y, 700, 975, 775, 1040, 30)) Then
b:=1;
IF (b=1) Then
ClickMouse(745, 1000, True);
IF (b=1) Then
MoveMouseSmooth(840, 600);
IF (a=1) Then
wait(200);
IF (a=1) And (b<>1) Then
If(IsMouseButtonDown(false)) Then
IF (FindBitmapToleranceIn(DistractingShot, x, y, 650, 975, 715, 1040, 30)) Then
c:=1;
IF (c=1) Then
ClickMouse(675, 1000, True);
IF (c=1) Then
MoveMouseSmooth(840, 600);
IF (c<>1) and (b<>1) Then
d:=1;
end;

begin
 repeat
  LoadBitmap;
  Interupt;
 until(false)

end.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a new SCAR Script im making! please!

item.title: Need help with a new SCAR Script im making! please!
item.dc:creator: @xrunehunterx xrunehunterx
item.description:
@xrunehunterx wrote:

Ok, so im making a SCAR script for a game, i made the script loop using the:

[code=python]begin
repeat
LoadBitmap;
Interupt;
until(false)

end.[/code]

function.

But then, after a few minutes or so of looping, the program just suddenly stops, and displays this error message:

[Runtime Error] : Exception: Can't create compatible DC in line 88 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 3.15\Scripts\Interupter.scar

line 88 is the begining of a bitmapstring function

DistractingShot := BitmapFromString(30, 23, 'beNpFlFlU01kSx' +

that is line 88, can anyone tell me what is wrong / why i would be getting this error message??

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a new SCAR Script im making! please!
